channel.title: CVE Feed for SmarterTools -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SmarterTools -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-24385|2024-06-20T12:59:45.590Z -- smartertools -- smartertrack
item.description: A Direct Object Access vulnerability in SmarterTools SmarterTrack leads to information disclosure This issue affects: SmarterTools SmarterTrack 100.0.8019.14010.

item.title: CVE-2022-24387|2024-06-20T12:59:45.305Z -- smartertools -- smartertrack
item.description: With administrator or admin privileges the application can be tricked into overwriting files in app_data/Config folder, e.g. the systemsettings.xml file. THis is possible in SmarterTrack v100.0.8019.14010

item.title: CVE-2022-24384|2024-06-20T12:59:44.982Z -- smartertools -- smartertrack
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SmarterTools SmarterTrack This issue affects: SmarterTools SmarterTrack 100.0.8019.14010.
